name: Money Mage
description: Play as Billy, an ordinary magician who just happens to want more money. Don't we all? He takes living from paycheck to paycheck to the extremes, using gold coins for everything he does. If her runs out of coins, the severe heartache and disappointment of it all makes him faint. Help him combat the greedy piggybanks, and grab the golden trophies that he so desperately wants.
